TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CalloutAnnotation extends System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.TextAnnotation

remarks.format:
## Remarks A callout annotation is the only annotation that draws a connection between the annotation position and the anchor point. This class can also display text and automatically calculate its required size.
Different callout styles are supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public CalloutAnnotation ();

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the offset that the X-position of the annotation has from the anchor point.
Docs.value: A value that represents the offset of the annotation's X-position from the anchor point.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorX%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.X%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation> must be anchored using either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorDataPoint%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.AnchorY%2A> property, and its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Annotation.Y%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the style of the callout line anchor cap.
Docs.value: A enumeration value that represents the style to use for a callout line anchor cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutAnnotation.CalloutAnchorCap%2A> property sets the style of the anchor cap for the line that connects the annotation with the anchor point. This property is only applicable when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.SimpleLine> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.CalloutStyle.Borderline> callout style is used.
